assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have not disclosed any competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent using a protocol approved by the Mayo Clinic institutional review board was obtained from all patients or patient representatives and can be provided upon request. All individual-level data has been appropriately deidentified. This research adheres to the Declaration of Helsinki.
